ED_Title: Debate on agenda items 37 entitled “The situation in the Middle East” and 38 entitled “Question of Palestine”
ED_DecisionText:
A. 

At its 67th plenary meeting, on 20 May 2021, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President (A/75/PV.67), recalling that the Assembly had held a debate on agenda item 37 entitled “The situation in the Middle East” at its 34th and 35th plenary meetings on 2 December 2020 and a debate on agenda item 38 “Question of Palestine” at its 34th plenary meeting on 2 December 2020, decided to hold an additional, joint debate on agenda items 37 and 38.  

B. 

At the same meeting, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President (A/75/PV.67), decided to hear a statement by the observer of the League of Arab States at that stage of the joint debate.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
